A margarite of America. By T. Lodge Lodge, Thomas, 1558?-1625.
[94] p.
Printed [by A. Jeffes] for Iohn Busbie, and are to be sold in S. Dunstons church-yard in Fleet-street at the little shop next Cliffords Inne, [London] : 1596.
Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A² B-M⁴ N² (-N2, blank). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
